Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurrences across all cases
Percentage of variants that include SW-Initial Reviewer Selection as a step in the process flow
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection directly followed by SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that is eventually followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurring before any reviewer-related reminder (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2)
Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that leads to at least one instance of SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in cases that ultimately result in SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection relative to the total occurrences of all reviewer selectionâ€“related activities (e.g., RW-Initial Reviewer Selection, RSW-Initial Reviewer Selection)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection appearing in variants with performance duration above the median case duration
Percentage of cases where SW-Initial Reviewer Selection is not followed by any SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same variant
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurring after Plagiarism Originality Report Completed but before any AE assignment activity
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that is succeeded by a deadline-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in rejected manuscripts (ending in SW-EIC Reject or SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Reject' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that appears only once per case versus multiple times in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases
